string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: You are the best!
Good, better, best. Never let it rest. \'Til your good is better and your better is best. \n(St. Jerome)
Either you run the day or the day runs you. \n(John Rohn)
Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory. \n(George S. Patton)
In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can. \n(Nikos Kazantzakis
When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on. \n(Franklin D. Roosevelt)
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it. \n(Charles R. Swindoll)
Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough. \n(Og Mandino)
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows. \n(Ralph Martson)
A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others. \n(Ayn Rand)
The secret of getting ahead is getting started. \n(Mark Twain)
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today. \n(H. Jackson Brown, Jr)
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart. \n (Helen Keller(
I can\'t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination. \n(Jimmy Dean)
Start by doing what\'s necessary; then do what\'s possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible. \n(Francis of Assisi)
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence. \n(Vince Lombardi)
We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us. \n(Joseph Campbell)
Nothing is impossible, the word itself says "I\'m possible"! \n(Audrey Hepburn)
Try to be a rainbow in someone\'s cloud. \n(Maya Angelou)
We know what we are, but know not what we may be. \n(William Shakespeare)
Change your thoughts and you change your world. \n(Norman Vincent Peale)
If you can\'t stop thinking about it, don\'t stop working on it.
A river cuts through rock not because of its power, but its persistence.
Don\'t be afraid to start over. It\'s a brand new opportunity to rebuild what you truly want.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
In order to succeed we must first believe that we can. \n(Nikos Kazantzakis)
Do it now! \nSometimes "later" becomes "never".
You have to fight through the bad days to earn the best days.
Nothing worth having comes easy.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new. \n(Albert Einstein)
Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
Work until your idols become your rivals. \n(Drake)
You got this!
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
If "Plan A" didn\'t work, the alphabet has 25 more letters.
To hell with circumstances. I create opportunities! \n(Bruce Lee)
Mistakes are proof that you are trying.
Believe in the person you want to become.
Don\'t worry about those who talks about you behind your back. They are behind for a reason.
Don\'t count the days. Make the days count.
When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
Your only limit is you!
Your future is created by what you do today. Not tomorrow.
It\'s hard to beat a person who never gives up. \n(Babe Ruth)
Prove them wrong!
Whether you think you can, or you think you can\'t, you are right. \n(Henry Ford)
When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you\'ll be successful.
Just do it!
